meanings.definition: To restore pressure to (a system or container)
meanings.sent1: After fixing the leak, he repressurizes the tire with air.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic repressurizes the hydraulic system to ensure proper functioning.
meanings.sent3: The balloon animal popped, so she repressurizes it to bring it back to life.
meanings.sent4: Just like a superhero, he repressurizes the spaceship to save the crew.
meanings.sent5: The scuba diver quickly repressurizes his oxygen tank before diving deep into the ocean.

meanings.definition: To increase the pressure within something
meanings.sent1: She repressurizes the water gun before the big water fight.
meanings.sent2: The pilot repressurizes the cabin for the comfort of the passengers.
meanings.sent3: The chef repressurizes the cream dispenser to create fluffy whipped cream.
meanings.sent4: The scientist repressurizes the chamber to observe the effects on the specimen.
meanings.sent5: To make the soda fizzy again, she repressurizes the bottle by shaking it.
